page.title: 07B.N. COMMUNITY GROUPS
page.content: ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ {THE '77 SOCIETY:}This is so named because it was started in 1977 after Buckland Newton W.I. had finished. The subscription is Â£1.00 and each meeting is 50p.At the meetings they have play readings and visiting speakers.They also organise outings to historic places and gardens. At present the membership stands at 26.Anybody can join.Meetings are every first Monday of the month,8.00-10.00. {THE YOUTH CLUB:}The Youth Club is held on either Tuesday or Wednesday at 7.00pm.Members play snooker, table tennis, darts or just chat. They also have a computer. Refreshments are also available. You can only attend The Youth Club if you are between the ages of 11-18. ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
